title: Grampa's sci-fi hits
creator_credit: Peter Zasuly, Bertram Siegelson and Amvest Video
brief_description: Grampa Munster, one of the most popular stars from the 60’s television series “The Munsters”, presents a selection of movie trailers from famous and less prominent science fictions films. Trailers featured include: Flash Gordon (1936), Flash Gordon’s trip to Mars (1938), Flash Gordon (1980), Godzilla (1956), Destroy all monsters (1968), King Kong (1933), Alien (1978), Barbarella (1968), Rocky Horror Picture Show (1975), Dr. Goldfoot and his girl bombs (1966), Buck Rogers (1978), Omega man (1971), Fahrenheit 451 (1966), The Blob (1958), 30 ft. bride of Candy Rock (1959), Village of the giants (1965), The Amazing colossal man (1957), Godzilla vs. Megalon (1976), Ghidra, the three headed monster (1964), Varan the unbelievable (1962), Reptilicus (1961), Atragon (1963), Creation of the humanoids (1962), Battle of the worlds (1961), Earth vs. the flying saucers (1956), This Island Earth (1954), The Day the Earth stood still (1951), and Lost world (1960).
